var element;

function pageLoad(sender, args) {
  Sys.WebForms.PageRequestManager.getInstance().add_endRequest(endRequest);
  element = $cmsj('#TaxAdjustingField input[type=text]');
  element._hasFocusLost = false;
}

function endRequest(sender, args) {
  if(!element._hasFocusLost)
  {
    element._hasFocusLost = true;
    $cmsj(element).focusout(function() {   
      __doPostBack(element.attr('name'), '');       
    })
  }
}

</script></contentbefore><defaultvalue>Personal</defaultvalue><fieldcaption>{$com.customer.accounttype$}</fieldcaption><fielddescription>{$com.customer.accounttype.description$}</fielddescription></properties><settings><controlname>RadioButtonsControl</controlname><Options>Personal

<form version="2"><field column="CustomerID" isunique="true" fieldtype="" reftype="" /><field allowempty="true" column="AccountType" columnsize="20" columntype="text" dummy="altform" guid="0686b07f-02c3-41b9-8465-da8d195254b4" hasdependingfields="true" publicfield="false" reftype="Required" system="true" visible="true" order="1"><properties><contentbefore><script type=""text/javascript"">

var element;

function pageLoad(sender, args) {
  Sys.WebForms.PageRequestManager.getInstance().add_endRequest(endRequest);
  element = $cmsj('#TaxAdjustingField input[type=text]');
  element._hasFocusLost = false;
  
  $cmsj(element).off();
  $cmsj(element).focusout(function() {   
      __doPostBack(element.attr('name'), ''); 
  })
}

function endRequest(sender, args) {
  if(!element._hasFocusLost)
  {
    $cmsj(element).off();
    element._hasFocusLost = true;
    $cmsj(element).focusout(function() {   
      __doPostBack(element.attr('name'), '');       
    })
  }
}

</script></contentbefore><defaultvalue>Personal</defaultvalue><fieldcaption>Account type</fieldcaption></properties><settings><controlname>RadioButtonsControl</controlname><Options>Personal
